item.title: MIUI OS1.0.4.0.UOFRUXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 14 Pro 4G Russia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 14 Pro 4G Russia

Codename: obsidian

Version: OS1.0.4.0.UOFRUXM | 14.0

Size: 7.3 GB

MD5: 37059242dedd1feb2b52c1b4e999b7ed

[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred when opening apps in some cases
Updated the security patch to November 2024. Increased system security.
